description: {"blocks":[{"key":"14erj","text":"The following protocol describes resuspension of lyophilized primers from (4) 96-Well plates shipped from Integrated DNA Technologies (IDT) at 3nmol per well using the epMotion 5075.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3arg1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f51b2","text":"For information about ordering consult the Earth Micriobiome Projects website.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":43,"length":35,"key":0}],"data":{}},{"key":"5of1a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvom","text":"Barcoded primer constructs for 16S V4 region are also described in the Earth Microbiome Project website.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":71,"length":33,"key":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A0C11620CE5911E895EF095DD99812CB","url":"https://press.igsb.anl.gov/earthmicrobiome/protocols-and-standards/primer-ordering-and-resuspension/"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D553A4C0CE5911E895EF095DD99812CB","url":"https://press.igsb.anl.gov/earthmicrobiome/protocols-and-standards/16s/"}}}}
before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3u1tg","text":"Please wear at least the minimum required personal protective equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c76cg","text":"Ensure that all necessary kit components are available as well as user-supplied consumables.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63jc0","text":"Remove nuclease and nucleotide contamination from work surfaces and instruments prior to starting using an appropriate solution, such as RNase AWAY™ (Thermo Scientific™ catalogue: 700511), followed by wiping with 70% to 100% molecular biology grade ethanol to remove additional contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials.reagent_name: ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 - 300 µL w/ filter

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvn2v","text":"(4) ep T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 -300 µL w/ filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ns6q","text":"(4) IDT 96-Well Lyophilized Primer Plates (3 nmoles of primer per well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85rmh","text":"(1) epMotion Reservoir 30 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g5kj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"9h1q2","text":"In a sterile 30mL reservoir, add 11.725\u00a0ml (required minimum volume) of PCR Clean Water to resuspend (4) 96-Well plates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4odgr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"bc8jh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"8F461240CE5B11E895EF095DD99812CB","amount":"11.725","unit":2,"label":"PCR Clean Water","step_guid":"44D33130CE5A11E895EF095DD99812CB"}}],"guid":"44D33130CE5A11E895EF095DD99812CB","id":673663,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Prepare reagents"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pqt5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"79bj1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"35kd9","text":"Follow the diagram below while setting up the epMotion worktable.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5pf5q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1hh8i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ah8k9","text":"Place (4) boxes of ep.T.I.P.S. Motion Racks 20 - 300 \u00b5L w\/ filter in slots A2-A5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9na4p","text":"Place (4) 96-Well plates of lyophilized primers from IDT in slots B2-B5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a33vk","text":"Place 30 mL reservoir with PCR Clean Water in slot 1 of the Resevoir Rack and place Rack in slot C5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a076q","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":181,"guid":"A5B8AF10CE5B11E895EF095DD99812CB","align":null,"brand":"Eppendorf","sku":"5075000962","specifications":"","file_id":null,"file_icon":null,"file_name":null,"image_id":null,"s3_image_name":null,"s3_file_name":null,"can_edit":true,"step_guid":"9CC98B40CE5B11E895EF095DD99812CB","image_name":null,"link":null,"type":"Liquid Handling","name":"epMotion 5075"}},{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"31122","guid":"C58120C0CE5B11E895EF095DD99812CB","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8nu3mm6.png","placeholder":"","original_name":"Capture5.PNG","mime":"image\/png","width":null,"height":null,"is_video":false}}],"guid":"9CC98B40CE5B11E895EF095DD99812CB","id":673664,"previous_id":673670,"previous_guid":"3B97D740CE5C11E895EF095DD99812CB","section":"Setup epMotion automation platform"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o8eu","text":"Remove box lids and plate foils and execute protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4n6qi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eek3n","text":"(Protocol must be imported to epBlue software prior to attempting to execute it. epBlue 40.6 or later)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":81,"length":20,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d6phu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"aaudi","text":"The automated protocol transfers 30\u00b5L of PCR Clean Water into the (4) different 96-Well Primer Plates and mix pipettes for 5 cycles to resuspend lyophilized primers to a 100 \u00b5M)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"segm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"file","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"31128","guid":"9ED06250CE5C11E895EF095DD99812CB","source":"https:\/\/s3.amazonaws.com\/pr-journal\/8n23mm6.export6","placeholder":"\/img\/extensions\/file.png","original_name":"Application_4_Resus_100uM_Primers_181003_105824.export6"}}],"guid":"0EE45C00CE5C11E895EF095DD99812CB","id":673667,"previous_id":673664,"previous_guid":"9CC98B40CE5B11E895EF095DD99812CB","section":"Execute automated protocol"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8n5jp","text":"Centrifuge all 96-Well primer plates to ensure lyophilized sample is at the bottom of the well. (3nmol primer per well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"3B97D740CE5C11E895EF095DD99812CB","id":673670,"previous_id":673663,"previous_guid":"44D33130CE5A11E895EF095DD99812CB","section":"Prepare Plates"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6cb4","text":"Remove plates from worktable and seal with storage aluminum foils. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"E2D20D50CE5C11E895EF095DD99812CB","id":673672,"previous_id":673667,"previous_guid":"0EE45C00CE5C11E895EF095DD99812CB","section":"Seal and store plates. "}
